verses.plain: Then Jonah prayed unto the LORD his God out of the fish’s belly,

tokens.t: Then Jonah prayed unto the
his God out of the fish’s belly,

verses.plain: And said, I cried by reason of mine affliction unto the LORD, and he heard me; out of the belly of hell cried I, and thou heardest my voice.

tokens.t: And said, I cried by reason of mine affliction unto the
, and he heard me; out of the belly of hell cried I,
thou heardest my voice.

verses.plain: For thou hadst cast me into the deep, in the midst of the seas; and the floods compassed me about: all thy billows and thy waves passed over me.

tokens.t: For thou hadst cast me into the deep, in the midst of the seas; and the floods compassed me about: all thy billows and thy waves passed over me.

verses.plain: Then I said, I am cast out of thy sight; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.

tokens.t: Then I said, I am cast out of thy sight; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.

verses.plain: The waters compassed me about, even to the soul: the depth closed me round about, the weeds were wrapped about my head.

tokens.t: The waters compassed me about,
to the soul: the depth closed me round about, the weeds were wrapped about my head.

verses.plain: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; the earth with her bars was about me for ever: yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption, O LORD my God.

tokens.t: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; the earth with her bars
about me for ever: yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption, O
my God.

verses.plain: When my soul fainted within me I remembered the LORD: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.

tokens.t: When my soul fainted within me I remembered the
: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.

verses.plain: They that observe lying vanities forsake their own mercy.

tokens.t: They that observe lying vanities forsake their own mercy.

verses.plain: But I will sacrifice unto thee with the voice of thanksgiving; I will pay that that I have vowed. Salvation is of the LORD.

tokens.t: But I will sacrifice unto thee with the voice of thanksgiving; I will pay
that I have vowed. Salvation
of the

verses.plain: ¶ And the LORD spake unto the fish, and it vomited out Jonah upon the dry land.

tokens.t: ¶ And the
spake unto the fish, and it vomited out Jonah upon the dry
